directions: In a large punch bowl, mix frozen lemonade with warm water (or cold if already thawed).
Slowly add Sprite and gently stir to combine.
Add a scoop of sherbet to a cup and pour punch over the top.
ingredients: 4 cans warm water, use the lemonade can
1 - 2 packets of Raspberry Lemonade powdered Kool-Aid mix
title: "Under the Sea" Blue Raspberry Lemonade Sherbet Party Punch Recipe
